publication.abstract: Â© The Author 2017. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved. Motivation There are many multiple testing correction methods. Some of them are robust to various dependencies in the data while others are not. Some of the implementations have problems for managing high dimensional list of P-values as currently demanded by microarray and other omic technologies. Results The program Myriads, formerly SGoF+, provides some of the most important P-value-based correction methods jointly with a test of dependency and a P-value simulator. Myriads easily manage hundreds of thousands of P-values. Availability and implementation http://myriads.webs.uvigo.es Contact myriads@uvigo.es Supplementary informationSupplementary dataare available at Bioinformatics online.
publication.title: Myriads: P -value-based multiple testing correction

summary.description: Software package for p-value-based multiple testing that also implements a dependence test and p-value simulation (formerly SGoF+).
